src:
MU Didesak Segera Tuntaskan Transfer Mario Mandzukic
06 Nov 2019, 20:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Mantan bek Manchester United, Wes Brown mendukung langkah mantan timnya untuk merekrut Mario Mandzukic. Brown menilai bahwa striker Juventus itu bakal menjadi tambahan yang bagus bagi skuat United.
Manchester United tengah mencoba mendatangkan penyerang baru di musim dingin nanti. Mereka mencari sosok yang bisa menggantikan peran Romelu Lukaku di skuat mereka saat ini.
Sejauh ini ada satu nama yang paling sering dikaitkan dengan United. Ia adalah penyerang Juventus, Mario Mandzukic.
Brown sendiri setuju jika United mendatangkan pemain Timnas Kroasia tersebut. "Dia [Mandzukic] pemain yang besar, kuat dan bisa menahan bola. Ia akan menjadi tambahan yang bagus untuk tim ini," ujar Brown kepada talkSPORT.

Baca komentar lengkap eks bek MU itu di bawah ini.
text:
MU Urged Immediately Complete Mario Mandzukic Transfer
Nov 6 2019, 20:00 by Bola.net
Former Manchester United defender Wes Brown supports the move of his former team to recruit Mario Mandzukic. Brown believes that the Juventus striker will be a good addition to United's squad.
Manchester United is trying to bring in a new striker next winter. They are looking for someone who can replace Romelu Lukaku in their current squad.
So far there is one name that is most often associated with United. He is the Juventus striker, Mario Mandzukic.
Brown himself agreed if United brought in the Croatian national team player. "He [Mandzukic] is a big, strong player who can hold the ball. He will be a good addition to this team," Brown told talkSPORT.

Read the full comments of the former MU defender below.
